text: Abrosimovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Bryzgalovskoye Rural Settlement, Kameshkovsky District, Vladimir Oblast, Russia. The population was 23 as of 2010. == Geography == The village is located 3 km north-west from posyolok imeni Karla Marksa and 11 km north from Kameshkovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Vladimir Oblast
title: Abrosimovo, Kameshkovsky District, Vladimir Oblast
